RunCommandsOnlyWhenLive.label: Accept Commands Only When Live
RunCommandsOnlyWhenLive.tooltip: Indicates whether the script only accepts commands while you are live.

DisplayPermissions.label: Display Permissions
DisplayPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to display the queue with !communityqueue.

ModifyPermissions.label: Modify Permissions
ModifyPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to modify the queue with !communityqueue remove, etc..

CommandName.label: Command Name
CommandName.tooltip: The command name is ! then whatever is in this box.

DisplayLimit.label: Queue Display Limit
DisplayLimit.tooltip: The maximum number of queued games that will be displayed with !communityqueue.

TwitchRewardNames.label: Redemption Names
TwitchRewardNames.tooltip: Specify the names of the Channel Point Redemptions that will trigger this event. Separate names with commas.

TwitchOAuthToken.label: Twitch oAuth Token
TwitchOAuthToken.tooltip: Enter an oAuth token that allows the bot to read channel point redemptions on the channel being watched.

btnGetToken.label: Get Token
btnGetToken.tooltip: Generate an oAuth Token for the watched twitch account with permissions to read channel point redemptions.

EnableGoogleSheets.label: Enable Google Sheets
EnableGoogleSheets.tooltip: Enable or disable updating a Google Sheet with your redemption information.

ExpiredTokenAction.label: Expired Token Action
ExpiredTokenAction.tooltip: When the oAuth token is expired, do you want to do nothing, post an alert in chat, or open a web page to generate a new token?

Sheet.label: Worksheet Name
Sheet.tooltip: Enter the sheet within your spreadsheet to modify.

DisplayMessageOnGameUnknown.label: If Game is Unknown, Display Redemption Message Instead
DisplayMessageOnGameUnknown.tooltip: When the value of Game is 'Unknown', display the value of Message instead.

EnableResponses.label: Enable Responses
EnableResponses.tooltip: Enable or disable bot responses to flag redemptions.

btnreadme.label: Open Readme
btnreadme._comment: Do not change the function name! Ever!!
